Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Dysfunction of this pathway may be a general phenomenon in the majority of cases of hereditary breast and / or ovarian cancer . .

Let's think step by step.

1. Hereditary breast cancer
2. Hereditary ovarian cancer

These are the "Disease" entities in the given paragraph. They are mentioned as types of cancer that may be associated with a dysfunction of a specific pathway.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Disease.

1. Breast cancer
2. Ovarian cancer

These are the relevant "Disease" entities in the given paragraph. I have removed the word "hereditary" as it refers to the mode of transmission of the disease, not the disease itself.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.
